alert.note: Alert for Marion (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 7:42PM CDT until October 12 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MARION COUNTY... At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hamilton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Winfield, Guin, Brilliant, Glen Allen, Gu- Win, Twin, Tucker, Texas, Piney Grove and Pikeville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
